entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:23 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.9°C
Wind: WNW 29 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
